alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kiowa County through 415 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, scattered strong thunderstorms were developing northeastward along a line extending from near Wiley toward the Brandon area. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar and satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan Lake, Neeoshe Reservoir, Towner, Chivington, Brandon, Neegronda Reservoir, Queens Reservoir and Sweetwater Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts may occur well away from precipitation or lightning.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County
